Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Amends the definition of the term "allowable college tuition expenses" and establishes a new schedule of tax credits for allowable college tuition expenses
Summary: Amends the definition of the term "allowable college tuition expenses"; establishes a new schedule of tax credits for allowable college tuition expenses.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the definition of "allowable college tuition expenses" and the tax credit allowed for such expenses
